title: Hello, World!
html:
What is this? This is a place for me to turn my thoughts into words. This post will give a brief introduction to me and how I intend to use this blog.

Who am I?

My name is Nathan Knowler. I am a human being living in western Canada who codes to feed himself and his family.

How will I use this blog?

I donâ€™t want to pigeon-hole the content too much, but what I think readers can expect is my thoughts on code, music, and perhaps topics relating to real life.
